content: Citizenship already can be gained by entering the military. I knew a young German kid who joined the Army and was working on his citizenship. A Mexican boy who lived here in Utah joined the Marines and was working on his citizenship when he was killed in Iraq. He was awarded full citizenship posthumously - - There may be some problems with MOSs that require Security Clearances, etc... and the Services are meeting their quotas already - but the possiblility is already there - - Wandering and Wondering
